t: Amazon.com: Flakes Colorall Flock Genoa 150g, collall B.V, Glitter, Decoration Ornaments, Paper Scrapbooking : Arte y Manualidades
s: Brand: collall B.V. Colorall FLOCK, creative multi-colored flakes (flocks) are suitable for almost any surface and create the appearance of natural stone. They are easy to use. Apply a layer of paint or glue and pour flakes into the non-dried layer. Allow to dry completely.
